ViewObject.Name: ODCustHrchyUpdAccessesVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT distinct b.parent_group_id FROM JTF_RS_GROUP_USAGES jrgu, JTF_RS_GROUPS_DENORM b, XX_TM_NAM_TERR_CURR_ASSIGN_V aaa, HZ_PARTY_SITES hzps WHERE aaa.group_id = b.group_id and aaa.entity_type='PARTY_SITE' and hzps.party_site_id = aaa.entity_id and nvl(hzps.identifying_address_flag, 'N') = 'Y' and hzps.status = 'A' and hzps.party_id = :1 and jrgu.usage IN ('SALES', 'PRM') and jrgu.group_id = b.group_id and b.start_date_active <= TRUNC(sysdate) and NVL(b.end_date_Active, sysdate) >= TRUNC(sysdate)
